name: playlist-enhancer
title: Playlist Enhancer
description: Playlist Enhancer allows you to create playlists from the current playing sounds as well as simplified copying of sounds between playlists using drag & drop. Curate your sounds and atmosphere and click the
button to create a playlist containing those sounds and their properties. All track settings (Volume, fade etc.) are accurately saved within the new playlist when curating playlists or moving songs.
